markdown:
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 49 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 47 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 44 [Ingnovim](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1591) **Source** [Pathfinder #150: Broken Promises](/Sources.aspx?ID=15) pg. 39 **Perception** +33 **Languages** [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2) **Skills** [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +36, [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) +39, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +32, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +32, [Medicine](/Skills.aspx?ID=9) +38, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +36 **Str** +8 **Dex** +6 **Con** +9 **Int** +10 **Wis** +5 **Cha** +2 **Infused Items** Ingnovim carries 4 [major acid flasks](/Equipment.aspx?ID=74), 4 [major alchemist's fire](/Equipment.aspx?ID=75), 2 infused [major bestial mutagens](/Equipment.aspx?ID=82), 4 [major bottled lightnings](/Equipment.aspx?ID=76), 4 [major frost vials](/Equipment.aspx?ID=77), 2 infused [major juggernaut mutagens](/Equipment.aspx?ID=94), and 4 [true elixirs of life](/Equipment.aspx?ID=91). These items last for 24 hours or until the next time he makes his daily preparations. **Items** [Alchemist's Tools](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2), _+2 [greater resilient](/Equipment.aspx?ID=279) [chain shirt](/Armor.aspx?ID=6)_, _+2 [greater striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [dagger](/Weapons.aspx?ID=3)_, formula book, syringe filled with unstable mutagen --- **AC** 43 **Fort** +35 **Ref** +29 **Will** +32 **HP** 350 **Immunities** [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126) --- **Speed** 25 feet **Melee** _dagger_ +29 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [thrown 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)), **Damage** 4d4+10 piercing **Melee** syringe +34 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170)), **Damage** 2d8+10 piercing **Ranged** bomb +36 ([range increment 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [Splash](/Traits.aspx?ID=150)), **Damage** varies by bomb **Inject Unstable Mutagen** ([Alchemical](/Traits.aspx?ID=6), [Mutagen](/Traits.aspx?ID=116), [Polymorph](/Traits.aspx?ID=127)) **Trigger** Ingnovim damages a creature with a syringe Strike; **Effect** The creature injected with unstable mutagen must attempt a DC 41 Fortitude save to resist the injection.
**Critical Success** The target is unaffected.
**Success** The target is [sickened 2](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34).
**Failure** The target's body shifts and mutates, growing difficult to control; the target is [clumsy 2](/Conditions.aspx?ID=3) and [enfeebled 2](/Conditions.aspx?ID=13) for 24 hours.
**Critical Failure** The target's body completely distorts into a shuddering blob of warped flesh that is incapable of action; the target is [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28). Every 24 hours, the target may attempt a new saving throw against this effect; on a critical success, the paralysis ends. **Mutagenic Adaptation** Ingnovim's body has adapted to the constant use of his mutagens. He does not suffer the drawback of any [bestial mutagens](/Equipment.aspx?ID=82) but is still affected normally by other mutagens.
name: Ingnovim

text: Ingnovim Recall Knowledge - Humanoid (Society): DC 49 Unspecific Lore : DC 47 Specific Lore : DC 44 Ingnovim Source Pathfinder #150: Broken Promises pg. 39 Perception +33 Languages Common, Draconic Skills Athletics +36, Crafting +39, Deception +32, Intimidation +32, Medicine +38, Society +36 Str +8 Dex +6 Con +9 Int +10 Wis +5 Cha +2 Infused Items Ingnovim carries 4 major acid flasks, 4 major alchemist's fire, 2 infused major bestial mutagens, 4 major bottled lightnings, 4 major frost vials, 2 infused major juggernaut mutagens, and 4 true elixirs of life. These items last for 24 hours or until the next time he makes his daily preparations. Items Alchemist's Tools, +2 greater resilient chain shirt , +2 greater striking dagger , formula book, syringe filled with unstable mutagen --- AC 43 Fort +35 Ref +29 Will +32 HP 350 Immunities poison --- Speed 25 feet Melee Single Action dagger +29 (Agile, Finesse, Magical, thrown 10 feet, versatile S), Damage 4d4+10 piercing Melee Single Action syringe +34 (Agile), Damage 2d8+10 piercing Ranged Single Action bomb +36 (range increment 20 feet, Splash), Damage varies by bomb Inject Unstable Mutagen Free Action (Alchemical, Mutagen, Polymorph) Trigger Ingnovim damages a creature with a syringe Strike; Effect The creature injected with unstable mutagen must attempt a DC 41 Fortitude save to resist the injection. Critical Success The target is unaffected. Success The target is sickened 2. Failure The target's body shifts and mutates, growing difficult to control; the target is clumsy 2 and enfeebled 2 for 24 hours. Critical Failure The target's body completely distorts into a shuddering blob of warped flesh that is incapable of action; the target is paralyzed. Every 24 hours, the target may attempt a new saving throw against this effect; on a critical success, the paralysis ends. Mutagenic Adaptation Ingnovim's body has adapted to the constant use of his mutagens. He does not suffer the drawback of any bestial mutagens but is still affected normally by other mutagens.
